name: damp

effect.scarlet-violet: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the-teal-mask: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the-indigo-disk: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.
